name: Linehart Wichperger
description: A jealous man. One of the most powerful in the alchemist's guild.

dialogs.responseText: You're not a guild member. What are you doing here?
You do? Well you're going to have a rough time learning it here, with Hadeas in charge.

dialogs.buttonText: I want to join the guild
dialogs.responseText: Good luck, we haven't welcomed a new member in decades. With Hadeas in charge, that's unlikely to change either.
He's a power-hungry newt who somehow managed to become headmaster of the guild by killing the previous headmaster.

dialogs.buttonText: Why was he made headmaster if he killed the previous one?
dialogs.responseText: Well no one can prove he did it! He's a sneaky little toad of a man without an ounce of integrity in his slimy body.

dialogs.buttonText: Maybe I could prove his guilt
dialogs.responseText: Hmmm... That is quite the idea... Yes, maybe we can work something out. I think I have an idea.
Do you want to join the guild and learn alchemy or not? How about you do something for me and I will make sure you can join the guild. Deal?

dialogs.buttonText: What do you want me to do?
dialogs.responseText: The plan is simple, plant a vial of poison in his bedroom. I'll take care of the rest. With proof of the murder in place, there won't be any opposition to finally ousting that walking caecilian.

dialogs.buttonText: I don't care about any of this, what do you want me to do?
dialogs.responseText: Plant a vial of poison in his bedroom.
Wonderful! Here's a vial of poison. Go plant it in the headmaster's room and come back to me.
Well it sounds to me as though you are not interested enough in alchemy to join this guild. You may leave. Tell no one of this conversation.
Be quick about it. And no word of this to the other alchemists, alright?

dialogs.buttonText: I changed my mind, give me the poison
dialogs.responseText: Wonderful! Here's a vial of poison. Go plant it in the headmaster's room and come back to me.

Well it sounds to me as though you are not interested enough in alchemy to join this guild. You may leave. Tell no one of this conversation.
You WHAT!? How could you possibly lose something like that? You had one job! I don't have any more. You'll have to procure some of your own.
You'll need to be discrete. There's an alchemist in the eastern district who has been banished from the guild. He made me the first bottle of poison and will probably have more.

You hide behind a bookshelf and follow Linehart to a dark area in the back corner of the library. He pulls a book off the shelf and grabs something behind it. Suddenly the wall next to the shelf transforms into a door, which he quickly opens and descends the spiral staircase on the other side.
The staircase opens to a horribly smelly tunnel. You have evidently entered the city's sewers. You follow Linehart at a distance, until he stops at a corner and begins to wait.

You step out to ask Linehart what he is doing. At the same moment, a cloaked figure appears around the corner at the far end of the tunnel. When they both see you, the take off running in separate directions.
You dash off in chase of Linehart. Thanks to your adept deftness, you easily catch up to him.
What am I doing? What are you doing? How did you find me and why are you chasing me? Are you not going to help me frame Hadeas? I thought we were on the same team.

dialogs.buttonText: We are on the same team
dialogs.responseText: And yet you chase and interrogate me? Your words and actions do not match.

I thought you wanted to join the alchemy guild. It's far too late for me to ever trust you again, there is something very suspicious about you. Please leave, now. I won't do anything else in your presence.
